message: I propose a fair 60/40 split. Let's get this done quickly.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going all the way to 60/40. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than 30/70. Let's split the difference and go with 45/55. This is my final offer.
I'm not budging on the 55/45 split, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. You're getting closer to your 45/55, but I need a bit more.
I understand you're not willing to budge on the 60/40 split. Let's meet in the middle at 40/60. This is my final offer, and if you reject it, I'm walking away.
